field.comment: Each incident has a particular type
field.name: incidentTypeId

field.comment: Each incident of a particular type can have an optional key for grouping purposes. For grouping. If no key is given, there is only one active instance per incident type
field.name: incidentKey

field.comment: How often the incident was reported while still ongoing. This is limited to the window for the type (if configured)
field.name: incidentCount

field.comment: An incident may be suppressed if we consider it not important (yet). E.g when the threshold is not yet reached
field.name: suppressed
